extendedInfo.description: Timesheet, timecard, timetracker, timeclock, punchclock* Multiple projects, separate comments on each* Time change: one click plus/minus buttons* Get reports of total hours per day, week and month* Enter hour rate => total revenue* Reports by email/csv file* Backup/RestoreAd free version existsSee hompage

reviews.title: Excellent! Perfect for keeping track of income!
reviews.comment: Really excellent, been using it flawlessly for 8+ months. Only improvements that could be made is to be able to calculate the amount made between certain dates, and the ability to set a base roster that could be set every week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I am only giving the app 4 stars because the info you put in doesn\'t sync to save the info. It would be nice when you get a new phone or have to reset your phone you could get your info back. Other than that this app is awesome. I use it ever day to keep track of my pay.
reviews.author: Jeremy Yarborogh

reviews.comment: Names are more important than short code. Names need bigger font. Need to sort by name not by code. Need batch delete of old sheets. Good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GREAT AP. Would like to see user controls for color, a work schedule with a widget and a method to track earned paid time off. Keep building, !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app for simple time keeping for multiple jobs per week. Like the feature to email spreadsheet too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Makes keeping track easier. Just need to be able to figure overtime after 8hr days and 40hr weeks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works really well
reviews.comment: Solid and flexible, very useful. Still some room for improvement (such as tallying hours in custom date ranges) but as is it\'s easy to use. I esp. like being able to add straight hours as well as time in/out, and log multiple projects at different rates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect app to keep track of my hours for 3 different jobs. Tried several others but this one is the easiest to use. Wish it said date in week view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Helps kkep track of jobs with the comment section.Love this app! I own a small business and this make
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Meh. Let me tell you how i want my csv, instead of poorly guessing. Hint: the actual times i worked would be useful to export...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the variable pay rate feature. Would like daily expenses and mileage boxes to get a total, but i can live without them. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for variable pay rates. Can generate a text report, not just CSV. Reports all projects, can\'t select a subset like in Time Recording.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time periods
reviews.comment: It would be functional if you could add \"time period\" calculation ability. For those who have set time periods and pay dates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Start.
reviews.comment: Would like to enter hours for salary job to see what my hourly rate would be based on the actual hrs I worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app a must have when u work alt of hours and the timekeepers always miss time. Also very easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a very basic time tracker. I would have liked it to automatically sort the tasks by time of day. And if bumped it will add time too easily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs to be able to sort quick add alphabetically
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app. Would be nice if it could calculate overtime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. It would benefit from being able too set the start/end time as the current time or manually set. Could you add an automatic backup? Cheers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app but when looking at monthly income totals, it goes from febuary to april. No march
reviews.author: A Google User
